You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesB B] > &boxhu;

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&boxHU;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2569/index.htm U+02569].
  * `&boxHu;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2567/index.htm U+02567].
  * `&boxhU;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2568/index.htm U+02568].
  * `&boxhu;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2534/index.htm U+02534].
